description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党的高级理论智囊，是“和平崛起”理论的提出者。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, a senior theoretical think tank of the Communist Party of China, and the proposer of the "Peaceful Rise" theory.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Zheng Bijian.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，郑必坚是其党员和高级理论智囊。
description.en: The ruling party of China, of which Zheng Bijian is a member and senior theoretical advisor.

description.zh-cn: 由郑必坚提出的关于中国发展的理论。
description.en: A theory about China's development proposed by Zheng Bijian.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾就读的中学。
description.en: A secondary school that Zheng Bijian attended.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾就读的中学。
description.en: A secondary school that Zheng Bijian attended.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾就读的大学。
description.en: A university that Zheng Bijian attended.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚在1951年曾参与的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in which Zheng Bijian participated in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾在此学习和任教。
description.en: Zheng Bijian studied and taught at this university.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾长期工作并担任常务副部长的机构。
description.en: An organization where Zheng Bijian worked for a long time and served as Executive Deputy Head.

description.zh-cn: 一场政治运动，期间郑必坚受到冲击并被下放劳动改造。
description.en: A political movement during which Zheng Bijian was purged and sent for labor reform.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，中共干部和知识分子接受“再教育”的场所。郑必坚曾被下放于此。
description.en: Places during the Cultural Revolution where CCP cadres and intellectuals received 're-education.' Zheng Bijian was sent to one.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚在1972年恢复工作后曾任职的国务院下属机构。
description.en: A subordinate body of the State Council where Zheng Bijian worked after resuming his duties in 1972.

en: Political Research Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾任职的国务院下属机构。
description.en: A subordinate body of the State Council where Zheng Bijian worked.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。郑必坚曾参与其著作的整理工作。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Zheng Bijian participated in the compilation of his works.

nodes.id: 中共中央毛泽东著作编辑出版委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中共中央毛泽东著作编辑出版委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 负责整理毛泽东理论和著作的机构，郑必坚曾在此工作。
description.en: The organization responsible for compiling Mao Zedong's theories and works, where Zheng Bijian once worked.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党理论家，曾与郑必坚共同起草提出“两个凡是”理论的社论。
description.en: A theorist of the Communist Party of China who co-authored the editorial proposing the "Two Whatevers" theory with Zheng Bijian.

description.zh-cn: 一个政治理论，由郑必坚和龚育之在1977年共同起草的社论中正式提出。
description.en: A political theory officially proposed in an editorial co-authored by Zheng Bijian and Gong Yuzhi in 1977.

nodes.id: 中共中央书记处研究室

en: Research Office of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾任理论组副组长的机构。
description.en: An organization where Zheng Bijian served as the deputy head of the theory group.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级官员，曾赏识郑必坚。
description.en: A senior official of the Communist Party of China who appreciated Zheng Bijian.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记，郑必坚曾担任其特别助理和政治秘书。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, for whom Zheng Bijian served as a special assistant and political secretary.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾任副院长的学术机构。
description.en: An academic institution where Zheng Bijian served as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾是其委员。
description.en: Zheng Bijian was a member of this committee.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾任常务副校长和学术委员会主任的机构。
description.en: An institution where Zheng Bijian served as Executive Vice President and Chairman of the Academic Committee.

en: 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾是其常务委员。
description.en: Zheng Bijian was a member of its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 于2011年授予郑必坚旭日大绶章的国家。
description.en: The country that awarded Zheng Bijian the Grand Cordon of the Order of the Rising Sun in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚的前任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: Zheng Bijian's predecessor as Executive Vice President of the Central Party School.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚的继任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: Zheng Bijian's successor as Executive Vice President of the Central Party School.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚的继任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Zheng Bijian's successor as Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚的前任中日友好21世纪委员会中方首席委员。
description.en: Zheng Bijian's predecessor as the Chinese chief member of the 21st Century Committee for China-Japan Friendship.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾担任中方首席委员的组织。
description.en: An organization where Zheng Bijian served as the Chinese chief member.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚的继任中日友好21世纪委员会中方首席委员。
description.en: Zheng Bijian's successor as the Chinese chief member of the 21st Century Committee for China-Japan Friendship.

en: 9th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚曾是其委员。
description.en: Zheng Bijian was a member of this committee.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚是“和平崛起”理论的提出者。
description.en: Zheng Bijian is the proposer of the "Peaceful Rise" theory.

description.zh-cn: 1951年，赴广西参加土地改革运动。
description.en: In 1951, he went to Guangxi to participate in the Land Reform Movement.

degree.zh-cn: 马列主义研究班研究生
degree.en: Graduate student in the Marxism-Leninism research class

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，郑必坚受到冲击，被下放五七干校劳动改造。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zheng Bijian was purged and sent to a May Seventh Cadre School for labor reform.

relationships.target: 中共中央毛泽东著作编辑出版委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 与龚育之共同起草了一篇题为《学好文件抓好纲》的社论，正式提出“两个凡是”的理论。
description.en: Co-authored an editorial with Gong Yuzhi titled 'Study the Documents Well and Grasp the Key Link', which formally proposed the "Two Whatevers" theory.

description.zh-cn: 与龚育之共同起草社论，正式提出“两个凡是”的理论。
description.en: Co-authored the editorial with Gong Yuzhi that officially proposed the "Two Whatevers" theory.

description.zh-cn: 与郑必坚共同起草社论，正式提出“两个凡是”的理论。
description.en: Co-authored the editorial with Zheng Bijian that officially proposed the "Two Whatevers" theory.

position.en: Deputy Head of the Theory Group

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚在中共中央书记处研究室工作期间，受到邓力群的赏识。
description.en: Zheng Bijian was appreciated by Deng Liqun while working at the Research Office of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 日本政府授予郑必坚旭日大绶章。
description.en: The Government of Japan awarded Zheng Bijian the Grand Cordon of the Order of the Rising Sun.

description.zh-cn: 汪家镠卸任中共中央党校常务副校长，由郑必坚接任。
description.en: Wang Jialiu stepped down as Executive Vice President of the Central Party School, and was succeeded by Zheng Bijian.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚卸任中共中央党校常务副校长，由虞云耀接任。
description.en: Zheng Bijian stepped down as Executive Vice President of the Central Party School, and was succeeded by Yu Yunyao.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚卸任中共中央宣传部常务副部长，由刘云山接任。
description.en: Zheng Bijian stepped down as Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee, and was succeeded by Liu Yunshan.

description.zh-cn: 杨振亚卸任中日友好21世纪委员会中方首席委员，由郑必坚接任。
description.en: Yang Zhenya stepped down as the Chinese chief member of the 21st Century Committee for China-Japan Friendship, and was succeeded by Zheng Bijian.

description.zh-cn: 郑必坚卸任中日友好21世纪委员会中方首席委员，由唐家璇接任。
description.en: Zheng Bijian stepped down as the Chinese chief member of the 21st Century Committee for China-Japan Friendship, and was succeeded by Tang Jiaxuan.
